sentences.english: Mold-making and aesthetic characteristics belong to one important element for the vein patterns of brocades of the Tujia people.
sentences.chinese: 造型與審美特徵是土家織錦紋樣構成的重要因素。

sentences.english: The sofa was covered with expensive brocade.
sentences.chinese: 沙發上鋪上了華貴的織錦。

sentences.english: Technology introductions The brocade is the colored silk production with decorative patterns or calligraphies and paintings.
sentences.chinese: 神奇的東方之花織錦是指有花紋或字畫的彩色絲織品。

sentences.english: When the painting is done, it is mounted on a brocaded silk border.
sentences.chinese: 當畫作完成後，再給它鑲上織錦的絲邊。

sentences.english: The broche fabrics of jacquard weave designs sexy night.
sentences.chinese: 提花的織錦面料設計性感的夜晚。

sentences.english: Aesthetic taste and the level of technic refrains the handicraftTujia brocade .
sentences.chinese: 審美眼光和技巧的高低制約着織錦工藝水平。

sentences.english: Push the chair of broche forge face, your elephant lets person infatuation like exotic princess.
sentences.chinese: 推開織錦鍛面的椅子，你象異國公主般讓人迷戀。

sentences.english: Another museum, the Gallery of Tapestries tells picture stories in wall hangings.
sentences.chinese: 另一件博物館，織錦畫廊則用牆飾來講圖片故事。

sentences.english: So, you learn spirit, so that put a beautiful tapestry of the motherland.
sentences.chinese: 於是，你把春蠶的精神汲取，讓祖國披上美麗的織錦。

sentences.english: In addition, with regard to the outside material, Chinese costumes are mostly made with silk.
sentences.chinese: 另外從面料來說，則主要使用織錦緞面料等。

sentences.english: In fact, it has become common to describe the United States as a mosaic or a tapestry.
sentences.chinese: 事實上，美國現在常常被描述爲拼畫或織錦。

sentences.english: It is lined with white and worn over a white brocaded gown.
sentences.chinese: 斗篷用白線與一件白色織錦禮服縫合在一起。

definition: to appreciate/to take pleasure in/to enjoy
Guangdong embroidery, one of the four major traditional styles of Chinese embroidery (the other three being 蘇繡|苏绣[Su1 xiu4], 湘繡|湘绣[Xiang1 xiu4] and 蜀繡|蜀绣[Shu3 xiu4])
delicate hands/woman's tender and soft hands
item made from woven silk or rayon
